nonzero_pole_indices, shape_functions = an.shape_functions(degree=1, order=
    1, knots=[0, 5], t=1.0566243270259357)
assert_array_almost_equal(nonzero_pole_indices, [0, 1])
assert_array_almost_equal(shape_functions, [[0.788675134594813, 
    0.21132486540518713], [-0.2, 0.2]])
nonzero_pole_indices, shape_functions = an.shape_functions(degree=1, order=
    1, knots=[0, 5], t=3.9433756729740645)
assert_array_almost_equal(nonzero_pole_indices, [0, 1])
assert_array_almost_equal(shape_functions, [[0.2113248654051871, 
    0.788675134594813], [-0.2, 0.2]])
staticmethod
